evidence.text:
Person B: oh wondrous rain clouds...don’t thunder too loudly... my lover is sleeping ...
Person B: Clouds with your naughty ways, are only causing a flutter in my heart. My lover is far away and maybe you can carry this message to him.
Person A: I am thinking of U...wen do I C U
Person B: Same time :) But we better not get late today. Prabha is getting suspicious
Person A: I know you had that pet duck as a kid!

Person A: He got some 4 likes on tiktok and now he wants to put up new songs every week. That fucker... he saw my t shirt and forced me to swap with him. He said it was more ‘youtube appropriate’ Then when I asked him for it back he started abusing me... !
Person B: Well..you do have nice clothes.. He must be jealous of you!

Person B: I feel your heartbeat.
Person A: It is beating very fast...
Person B: Can you feel mine?
Person A: Yea....
Person A: Aunty and Uncle are going to a wedding tomorrow night.

Person B: Why would I have a burqa, Shiaz!
Person A: No need to scrunch up your pretty face, detective.
Person A: U can’t come here!
Person A: Everyone came back early..Nikah cancelled.... the Harbour Metro Line is flooded... :( Dnt b mad.

Person A: I wish I cd sit w U.
Person A: I like your yellow dress!

Person A: Will you be long?
Person A: Kiss me again...

Person A: I have been scared since I met you.
Person A: I used to ask myself many times... if I was doing the right thing being with you....or it would have been best to stay apart.
Person A: But then ...when I am with you… I don't know what it is… I feel not afraid at all.. As if this Is the most natural way for us to be.

Person B: Our love is endless like the sea.. We shall flow with it wherever it takes us...
Person B: You wrote it... didn't you?
